title: '47 Brand Co-Founder Arthur D'Angelo throws out the First Pi
description:
'47 Brand co-founder, Arthur D'Angelo was honored at Fenway Park on September 21, 2013 and threw out the 1st pitch to Red Sox second-baseman Dustin Pedroia. 

Video Credit: The Boston Red Sox

'47 Brand is a sports lifestyle brand based out of Boston. We're a proud partner of the NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL and over 900 colleges. Established in 1947.

asset.author: Forty Seven Brand
